newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan auctions 6-mth bonds for 19.91 bln rupees.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan auctions 6-mth bonds for 19.91 bln rupees.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan said it had auctioned six-month short-term federal bonds worth 19.91 billion rupees on Saturday at a weighted average yield of 15.42049 percent per annum.
Bids worth a total of 26.485 billion rupees were received out of which bids for 19.91 billion rupees were accepted, a bank statement said.
In the previous auction held on August 4, bids worth 5.102 billion rupees were accepted at a weighted average yield of 15.38533 percent per annum.
